snippet: With the World Series over, Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez resumed his criticism of Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez resumes his criticism of Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig for the investigation that led to a 211-game suspension for violations of MLB drug agreement and labor contract; Rodriguez is continuing efforts to have suspension overturned.
lead_paragraph: With the World Series over, Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez resumed his criticism of Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig.
